hero.name: Zuleny Cruz Rodriguez
hero.description: Software Developer with product vision, focused on efficiency and building high-impact systems.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Software Developer with 3+ years of experience across the full application lifecycle, with a strong focus on Backend development, Databases, and designing System Architectures (Microservices/Monolithic). I also possess knowledge and experience in Frontend (React, Flutter) to provide a comprehensive approach to development.
about.paragraph2: I deliver value by building effective and sustainable solutions, such as developing GPS decoders currently utilized by over 300 active devices, demonstrating high proficiency in high-impact systems.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
achievements: Developed and implemented new GPS frame decoding protocols, successfully integrating over 300 devices.
Optimized event logging and notification delivery (push, WhatsApp, email, SMS), significantly reducing sending time.
Restructured and refactored all reports to improve code efficiency and organization.
Reduced Google Maps API consumption by 80% using a caching mechanism, leading to a significant decrease in requests.

jobs.title: Jr. Full Stack Developer
achievements: Collaborated in the development and implementation of web applications for the education, logistics, and e-commerce sectors.
Developed a web application for managing avant-premiere registrations and a mobile app for selling antivirus licenses.
Reduced critical report loading times by 50% in a note management application.

jobs.title: Development and Support Internship
achievements: Developed new functionalities for three web platforms and a socket service, contributing to system stability.

categories.title: Tools & Practices
items: DevOps & Cloud: Docker, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP)

1.title: Satellite Asset Monitoring Platform
1.description: Comprehensive web and mobile solution for asset management. It allows real-time visualization of assets (vehicles), management of geographic objects (geofences, locations, routes), and configuration of alerts and reports. The system is scalable to integrate new GPS device models and features sub-user management and role-based permissions.

2.title: Web Application for Grade Management
2.description: Web platform for comprehensive academic information management. The system manages user registration (teachers, parents, students, etc.), the structure of academic periods (two-month periods, trimesters, etc.), and automates grade entry. It allows for the automatic generation of reports and report cards.

3.title: Logistics Management Platform (Courier)
3.description: Web and mobile solution for shipment management and package tracking. The system allows for the management of users (customers, couriers) and subsidiaries, where packages are received and shipped. Customers can get quotes and request shipments directly from the app, which also includes a dedicated application for couriers. It allows for operational management and report generation.

4.title: Web Application for Meal Plan Management
4.description: Web solution for managing nutritional counseling and personalized catering services. Manages 15- or 30-day meal plans (configurable), integrating an initial consultation and periodic check-ups to measure patient progress. The system allows customers to modify their delivery schedule and check the progress of their measurements.

items.title: Diploma in IT Infrastructure in the Cloud with Open Source Software
items.institution: Graduate School of Engineering UAGRM University
